p: Single herbs, or multiple herbs combined to obtain original recipes, can be used. Particularly, a Newar medicinal recipe, used to treat various ailments, was found to be in practice. It is prepared with aerial parts of Artemisia indica, Centella asiatica, Drymaria cordata, Mentha spicata, Oxalis corniculata ( Figure 1D), Tagetes erecta, seeds of Oroxylum indicum, sprouts dried of Oryza sativa, wood of Picrasma quassioides and limestone powder. A typical feature of Newari medicine is that different medicinal plants can be used to treat a number of diseases [ 32].
